member.summary: Arguments for disconnection events.
member.remarks: There are currently no members to this class, it is here for future use.

member.name: P:DarkRift.Client.DisconnectedEventArgs.LocalDisconnect
member.summary: If the disconnect was requested by a call to .

member.name: P:DarkRift.Client.DisconnectedEventArgs.Error
member.summary: The error that caused the disconnect.
member.remarks:
If is true this field will be set to a default value and should be ignored.
If the contents of this property is consider exploring for a general exception that caused the disconnection instead.

member.name: P:DarkRift.Client.DisconnectedEventArgs.Exception
member.summary: The exception that caused the disconnection.
member.remarks: If is true this field will be set to a default value and should be ignored.
